caption:
This image captures a vibrant harbor scene under a clear blue sky. In the foreground, a large yellow and black tugboat, named "Bowman," is prominent at the dock. The boat has visible equipment on deck, including a large spool, possibly for ropes or cables. There's another tugboat just behind it, sporting white, black, and red colors.

The background is a mix of old and new architecture. Notably, a historic-looking tower with a sharp spire (reminiscent of late 19th or early 20th-century design) contrasts with two modern, tall, narrow rectangular buildings, possibly residential or office high-rises. The older building provides an interesting bridge between past and present urban design.

The dock area and the calm water in the foreground offer a tranquil but busy maritime setting, hinting at an area frequently used for transport and possibly commercial activities. The perspective implies a view from another boat or from across the water, giving a broad overview of the waterfront's interface with the city.
title: New apartment towers on the waterfront- seen from Old Bridge on Northern Avenue
